Product.Name: J.Crew Bowery Herringbone Wool Trousers
Product.Description: Create a smart, tailored silhouette in these herringbone weave straight leg wool trousers by J.Crew. Thoroughly classic, this elegant pair are a sartorial secret weapon - use them to lend a sophisticated touch to a casual T-shirt or sweater. Shown here with a McQ by Alexander McQueen T-shirt and Maison Martin Margiela jacket and boots.

Product.Name: Essential chino in 484 slim fit
Product.Description:
Our slimmest fit yet, these are definitely the coolest way to get dressed up in the morning. We make our clean-cut chinos with crisp two-ply cotton twill, then wash them lightly so they're laid-back but still refined. Contrast piping at interior waistband. Zip fly. Slant pockets, back welt pockets. Import. Machine wash.
  • Extra-slim fit.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: Ludlow slim suit pant in thornproof wool
Product.Description:
Crafted in English wool from the legendary Abraham Moon mill, known for producing some of the world's finest fabrics since 1837. The tweed is hearty yet refined, thanks to two-fold twisted yarns that create the durable cloth, and our designers added interior buttons for suspenders. Zip fly. Partially lined. A Collector's Item. Import. Dry clean. The narrow leg opening of this pant looks just right with a slightly shorter inseam. We recommend ordering 1/2" to 1" shorter than your regular inseam.
  • Extra-slim fit.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: Bowery wool in classic fit
Product.Description:
The wear-to-work pant you'll actually want to wear. Crafted in our crisp lightweight wool with distinctive suiting details including a tailorable back rise and waistband for a truly bespoke fit. It's perfectly polished from nine to five. Zip fly. Off-seam pockets, back welt pockets. Partially lined. Import. Dry clean.
  • Sits on hips, slim through hip and thigh, with a narrow leg.

Product.Name: Bowery wool in urban slim fit
Product.Description:
Fret not, fashion-forward nine-to-fivers, we've crafted an even slimmer-fitting pant for you. This slim and trim version of our classic Bowery pant is a wear-to-work pant you'll actually want to wear. Crafted in crisp lightweight wool with distinctive suiting details including a tailorable back rise and waistband for a truly bespoke fit. Zip fly. Off-seam pockets, back welt pockets. Partially lined. Import. Dry clean.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: Bowery wool crosshatch in classic fit
Product.Description:
The wear-to-work pant you'll actually want to wear. Crafted in our breathable and insulating wool microgrid with distinctive suiting details including a tailorable back rise and waistband for a truly bespoke fit. It's perfectly polished from nine to five. Zip fly. Off-seam pockets, back welt pockets. Partially lined. Import. Dry clean.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: 5-To-9 Fleece Pant
Product.Description: The ultimate unwind pant, these are supersoft and crazy comfortable but the detailing makes them presentable enough to wear out walking the dog or running errands. You'll reach for these the minute you walk in the door. Cotton/poly. Rib trim at waistband. Slant pockets. 30 1/2" inseam. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Stanton pant in 484 slim fit
Product.Description:
Extra-slim fitting and easygoing, this pant is the perfect alternative to denim. And like all our Stanton collection, we wash each pair for over 300 minutes for that perfect broken-in feel, then we have them garment-dyed and dusted with pigment to achieve a rich, saturated color and a vintage look. Cotton. Zip fly. Off-seam pockets, back welt pockets. Import. Machine wash.
  • Extra-slim fit.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: Ludlow slim suit pant in fine-stripe cotton
Product.Description:
A leaner version of our best-selling suit pant that's cut slightly more narrow through the rise, thigh, knee and leg opening. The effect is thoroughly modern. Lightweight and cool in specially yarn-dyed cotton with a very subtle stripe. Herringbone interior waistband with silk-tie fabric detail at center. Zip fly. Import. Dry clean. The narrow leg opening of this pant looks just right with a slightly shorter inseam. We recommend ordering 1/2" to 1" shorter than your regular inseam.
  • Extra-slim fit.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: Ludlow suit pant in glen plaid Italian wool
Product.Description:
Our signature suiting rendered in a smart glen plaid, meticulously crafted from four-season world-class Super 150s wool fabric by Loro Piana. Zip fly. Partially lined. A Collector's Item. Import. Dry clean.
  • Slim, more tailored fit.
  • Straight through hip and thigh, with a narrow leg.

Product.Name: Ludlow slim suit pant in worsted wool
Product.Description:
A leaner version of our best-selling suit pant that's cut slightly more narrow through the rise, thigh, knee and leg opening. The effect is thoroughly modern. Commonly known as sharkskin, this luxurious wool comes from Lanificio di Tollegno, one of the oldest mills in Italy. Nestled in the midst of Biella's Prealps, this mill is one of the last of its kind and is known for producing some of the finest suiting wool in the world. The fabric is woven with alternating colors of thread, giving the wool its distinctive look. Zip fly. Partially lined. Import. Dry clean. The narrow leg opening of this pant looks just right with a slightly shorter inseam. We recommend ordering 1/2" to 1" shorter than your regular inseam.
  • Extra-slim fit.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: Ludlow tuxedo pant
Product.Description:
A special pant for the most special of occasions, in the finest Italian wool from Lanificio di Tollegno, one of the oldest mills in Italy. Nestled in the midst of Biella's Prealps, this mill is one of the last of its kind and is known for producing some of the finest suiting wool in the world. To ensure true heirloom-worthy quality that never goes out of style, our designers gave this classic tuxedo pant traditional bespoke details, like a satin stripe along the outseam and partial lining. Zip fly. Interior buttons for suspenders. Partially lined. Import. Dry clean.
  • Slim, more tailored fit.
  • Straight through hip and thigh, with a narrow leg.

Product.Name: Ludlow slim suit pant in Italian wool
Product.Description:
A leaner version of our best-selling suit pant that's cut slightly more narrow through the rise, thigh, knee and leg opening. The effect is thoroughly modern. Meticulously crafted from four-season world-class wool fabric by Loro Piana. Zip fly. Partially lined. Import. Dry clean. The narrow leg opening of this pant looks just right with a slightly shorter inseam. We recommend ordering 1/2" to 1" shorter than your regular inseam.
  • Extra-slim fit.

Product.Name: J.Crew Urban Bowery Slim Fit Cotton Trousers
Product.Description: J.Crew slim-fit grey cotton trousers with two front and two rear button-fastening pockets, and a zip and button fly. These smart trousers are an easy, throw-on-and-go style that will guarantee weekend cool. Shown here with a Polo Ralph Lauren jacket, Paul Smith London shirt and Pierre Hardy shoes.

Product.Name: Ludlow suit pant in Italian cotton piqué
Product.Description:
Do summer with swagger. Presenting our newest lightweight suiting fabric crafted from fine Italian cotton piqué with a touch of linen for a distinct texture. Come off uncommonly cool at weddings or effortlessly smart at the office. Established in 1862, Lanificio di Tollegno crafted this exquisite blend exclusively for J.Crew but the true magic is in the dyeing process. Traditional pigments were mixed with natural resin to achieve that coveted vintage flair. Zip fly. Partially lined. Import. Dry clean.
  • Slim, more tailored fit.
  • Straight through hip and thigh, with a narrow leg.

Product.Name: Ludlow tuxedo pant in Italian chino
Product.Description:
The quintessentially cool, warm-weather tuxedo pant. Classic and crisp in smooth cotton twill woven in Italy's storied Crespi mill. One of Italy's oldest and most prestigious mills, it's renowned for its superior fabrications and superb craftsmanship. Crespi's artisans specially wash the twill exclusively for us. The process makes it harder to ensure color consistency from batch to batch but also gives the fabric an exceptionally soft feel, so we insist. If you have any concerns about color variation in our suiting, please contact us 24/7 at 800 562 0258. Zip fly. Interior buttons for suspenders. Partially lined. Import. Dry clean.
  • Slim, more tailored fit.
  • Straight through hip and thigh, with a narrow leg.

Product.Name: Bowery fine stripe in classic fit
Product.Description:
The wear-to-work pant you'll actually want to wear. With a clean silhouette in our subtly striped cotton and a tailored, modern fit, it's perfectly polished from nine to five. Cotton. Zip fly. Off-seam pockets. Import. Machine wash.
  • Sits on hips, slim through hip and thigh, with a narrow leg.

Product.Name: J.Crew Urban Stanton Straight Leg Trousers
Product.Description: Grey wool straight leg trousers from J.Crew with four pockets and a zip fly. A solid pair of trousers will stay the style course from season to season; pair these ones with a crisp shirt and smart shoes for an easy weekend ensemble. Shown here with a Folk shirt, J.Crew sweater, Opening Ceremony shoes and WANT Les Essentiels de la Vie bag.

Product.Name: Stanton cargo pant in urban slim fit
Product.Description:
The rugged side of one of our favorite pants of the season. The modern urban slim fit gets military-inspired details like cargo pockets, twill waist tabs and sturdy topstitch reinforcements. We wash each pair for over 300 minutes for that perfect broken-in feel, then we have them garment-dyed and dusted with pigment to achieve a rich, saturated color and a vintage look. Cotton. Zip fly. Off-seam pockets. Import. Machine wash.
  • Sits below waist, slimmer through hip and thigh, with a narrower leg.

Product.Name: J.Crew Slim Leg 484 Corduroy Trousers

Introduce corduroy trousers to your winter wardrobe as an alternative to standard wool; contrast the warm texture with a neat shirt for casual style with panache. Shown here with a J.Crew shirt, Maison Martin Margiela shoes and a Seil Marschall bag.

Product.Name: Vintage cord in relaxed fit
Product.Description:
A perfectly worn perennial favorite, now in our most laid-back fit. The design was inspired by vintage American 5-pocket cords; the new sulphur-dye and vintage-wash process is all ours. We gave them an authentic jean look and feel with handsanding on the thighs, knees and seat, with additional grinding along the waistband, pockets and hem. Cotton. Zip fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling with reinforced back pockets. Import. Machine wash.
  • Sits below waist, relaxed through hip and thigh, with a slightly wider leg.

Product.Name: J.Crew Ludlow Tuxedo Suit Trousers

Shown here with the matching J.Crew jacket, Brooks Brothers shoes and a J.Crew shirt and bow tie.

Shown here with the matching J.Crew jacket, a Jil Sander shirt and Common Projects sneakers.

Product.Name: Essential chino in giant fit
Product.Description:
We make our clean-cut chinos with crisp two-ply cotton twill, then wash them lightly so they're laid-back but still refined. Contrast piping at interior waistband. Zip fly. On-seam pockets, back welt pockets. Import. Machine wash.
  • Sits on hips, relaxed through hip and thigh, roomier fit, with a fuller leg.

Product.Name: Solid end-on-end woven boxers
Product.Description: Our signature cotton boxers are specially washed so they're supersoft and incredibly comfortable. J.Crew logo elastic waistband. Fly front. 6" inseam. Import. Machine wash. S, M, L, XL.

Product.Name: Martini Holiday boxers
Product.Description: Cheers! Our tuxedo-clad friends toast to a merry season. Lightweight cotton, peached and washed for softness. J.Crew logo elastic waistband. Fly front. Seamed bubble back for comfortable fit. 6" inseam. Import. Machine wash. S, M, L, XL.
